name: AddTaskComment
description:
Add a new comment to a specific task on ClickUp.

This tool allows users to add a new comment to a specified task on ClickUp. It should be called when there's a need to comment on a task, offering a way to communicate updates, feedback, or any relevant information directly related to the task in question.

parameters.name: specific_task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to add the comment to. Required for identifying the target task.

parameters.name: comment_content
parameters.description: The text of the comment to be added to the task. It should contain any updates, feedback, or relevant information.

parameters.name: send_notifications_to_all
parameters.description: If true, notifications will be sent to everyone, including the creator of the comment.

value_schema.description: If `notify_all` is true, notifications will be sent to everyone including the creator of the comment.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its custom task ID (set `custom_task_ids` to true).

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: comment_assignee_id
parameters.description: An integer representing the user ID of the assignee for the comment on the task.

parameters.name: assignee_group
parameters.description: Specifies a group of users (as a comma-separated string) to be assigned to the comment. Ensure the group is relevant to the task.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.
